info.title: AzureSphereManagementClient
info.description: Use these APIs to manage Azure Sphere in your Azure subscription

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

BulkDeviceRegistration.description: An Azure Sphere Bulk Device Registration

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

BulkDeviceRegistrationListResult.description: The response of a BulkDeviceRegistration list operation.

prefixDeviceName.description: Prefix for the device name to be used when registrating the device

sharedKey.description: Shared key to be expected from devices to send during registration process

registrationUri.description: Registration URI for the devices on this batch to point

maxRegistrationCount.description: Max count of devices to be registered for this registration bulk

registrationCount.description: Count of current devices registered for this registration bulk. Starts in 0

expirationDate.description: Expiration date for his bulk device registration

BulkDeviceRegistrationProperties.description: Properties of the bulk device registration

BulkDeviceRegistrationUpdate.description: The updatable properties of the BulkDeviceRegistration.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

DeviceListResult.description: The response of a Device list operation.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

DeviceRegistrationListResult.description: The response of a DeviceRegistration list operation.

deviceResourceIdentifier.description: Azure identifier for the device resource of this registration

DeviceRegistrationUpdate.description: The updatable properties of the DeviceRegistration.

DeviceUpdate.description: The updatable properties of the Device.

RegistrationState.description: State of the device registration. If inactive, no certificates will be delivered to the device.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

SphereListResult.description: The response of a Sphere list operation.

certificateRequestUri.description: Endpoint for the devices to request a certificate with the attestation key

updateInformationUri.description: Endpoint for the devices to get the list of pending updates

SphereUpdate.description: The updatable properties of the Sphere.

TopParameter.name: $top
TopParameter.description: The maximum number of results that should be included in the response

SkipTokenParameter.name: $skipToken
SkipTokenParameter.description: A continuation token used to continue from a previous page of results
